```py
>>> x = np.arange(6).reshape(2,3)
>>> x.flags
 C_CONTIGUOUS : True
 F_CONTIGUOUS : False
 OWNDATA : False
 WRITEABLE : True
 ALIGNED : True
 WRITEBACKIFCOPY : False 
```

```py
>>> y = np.require(x, dtype=np.float32, requirements=['A', 'O', 'W', 'F'])
>>> y.flags
 C_CONTIGUOUS : False
 F_CONTIGUOUS : True
 OWNDATA : True
 WRITEABLE : True
 ALIGNED : True
 WRITEBACKIFCOPY : False 
```
